text: <@U03FJQPSC0Y> my requirement is very simple, when we click on "Action2" button I want to display "*Graph3*  Create custom cards with projects" and when we click on "Action3" button I want to display "*Graph4*  In the custom card's JSON file, you can configure positioning either"

*Tell us about your iframes!*
Hello! we want to understand the iframe apps built by you or your teams to show on CRM pages. Hereâ€™s a short survey to gather these details: <https://forms.gle/D9FB5fjbzjt6N67b6>
> All survey results are going to be private and will be kept confidential.

Hi Prasad, did you also post on the community group?
I think the only way you can do this today, would be to trigger different serverless functions that would send newer set of sections to the card. So, Graph 2 button would trigger function for Graph2, that renders common sections (buttonrow) + graph, and so on. We are meeting tomorrow, so I can check more, but these are my initial thoughts.
